_sText:
Bhop is all about strafing, not speed.

I take no credit for any of these maps, all I did was make them force sv_enablebunnyhopping 0. I made these like 2 years ago when they first introduced the command, and since \_strafe maps are becoming more popular I thought I would upload these.

- bhop\_1n5an3\_strafe
- bhop\_aztec\_strafe
- bhop\_bkz\_goldbhop\_strafe
- bhop\_caves\_original\_strafe
- bhop\_eazy\_strafe
- bhop\_larena\_strafe
- bhop\_prostyle\_strafe

If you like real bhop, join [http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe ""). Keep an eye out for more \_strafe maps from tony montana, keyuu and myself in the future.


EDIT ~ HAD TO FIX BHOP\_EAZY\_STRAFE, ALL GOOD NOW
